name: Brain
greetingText: 你知道吗？今天是小满节气!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text3: 小得盈满，方为大成。愿你如这节气一般，不急不躁，稳步前行.
text4: 愿你心怀热爱，步履不停，拥抱每一个平凡又美好的瞬间
wishHeading: Happy Birthday!愿你的世界永远充满阳光。
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
